name: Collecting Coins on Both sides of the Book
name_original: Collecting Coins on Both sides of the Book
description:
use arrow keys to rotate the character, we disclude mobile users and WASD fans! Avoid enemies, Power-ups can be used once before you need to collect another, to bypass this you can collect many power-ups, only one of them from the collection will be used up and you can use another one! Don't touch the Border as well without the Bounce off Border Power-up!

Music: https://www.beepbox.co/#8n31s0k0l00e04t2mm0a7g0fj07i0r1o3210T1v0L4u01q1d5f7y1z2C...

Scratch Project:  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/577080093
